CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(DPAS_Rating__c, 'DO') , Date_Customer_PO_Received__c + CASE( MOD(DATEVALUE(Date_Customer_PO_Received__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, 19, 1, 21, 2, 21, 3, 21, 4, 21, 5, 21, 6, 20, 0), IF( ISPICKVAL(DPAS_Rating__c, 'DX') , Date_Customer_PO_Received__c + CASE( MOD(DATEVALUE(Date_Customer_PO_Received__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, 12, 1, 14, 2, 14, 3, 14, 4, 14, 5, 14, 6, 13, 0), null) )
CustomField.label: DPAS Due Date
